description: Details submitted pursuant to reference 19/03493/FUL: external finishing materials (4), surfacing materials (5), landscaping (6), enclosure (7), ground levels (8), refuse and recycling storage (9), construction management plan (10), cycle parking (11), SuDS (12), boundary fence (14), solar panels (15), considerate constructors scheme (16) and noise levels (17) in respect of redevelopment of site and erection of a 2-storey block of 5 x self-contained flats, comprising 3 x 1-bed and 2 x 2-bed with cycle parking, refuse storage and landscaping.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
